name: Robot Cat and Donuts beta
description:
Beta Version of our project for GAD181 @ SAE, Bachelor of Game Development. This was made between 5 people. We're only in stage 1. Some of us have only had exposure to game development since the start of the year.

If you'd like, we wouldn't mind any feedback, please play for 10 mins (to hopefully play all the micro games) and then fill out this Feedback Form to help us improve this before showcase.

Usually Stage 1 students don't do showcase, but I'd be happy if we can improve this to a stage where we can.

We have already made changes for the final build.
